thread.title: Probe to examine pair over bidding for 2018 & 2022 World Cups
thread.title_full: Probe to examine pair over bidding for 2018 & 2022 World Cups

title: Probe to examine pair over bidding for 2018 & 2022 World Cups
text:
Probe to examine pair over bidding for 2018 & 2022 World Cups 
CCTV.com Share this: Share on twitter Share on facebook Share on sinaweibo Share on email Font size: 
The FIFA Ethics Committee is keeping busy, adding two new names to the list of those being investigated, as German legend Franz Beckenbauer and Spaniard Angel Maria Villar have undergone scrutiny by ethics prosecutors, and are awaiting a verdict in their cases.Both men had previously been identified as targets of an investigation, but Wednesday was the first time their names have been confirmed publicly. 
Both Beckenbauer and Villar -- now also reportedly serving as FIFA's interim senior vice president while President Sepp Blatter is suspended -- have previously been identified by media as targets of the investigation into the bidding for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups. 
Beckenbauer and former Spain international Villar were members of FIFA's much-discredited executive committee when it chose Russia and Qatar as future World Cup hosts in December 2010. Related Videos
